features: Impressive Inch Action Figures: With detailed articulation and design, Sonic The Hedgehog Action Figure Toy provides cool action figures for kids to recreate their favorite scenes from the Sonic universe.
Collect all 5 Sonic action figures, including Sonic figure, Knuckles toy, Tails, Shadow sonic, and Amy Rose. These cool action figures are a perfect addition to any Sonic fan.
These buildable action figures come with interchangeable arms, as well as multiple items to accessorize your Sonic character. These sonic toys are great for age levels 6-8 and up.
These figurines of classic characters are perfect to display and come in different varieties including Knuckles Action Figure and shadow the hedgehog action figure.
This officially licensed buildable sonic toy comes with interchangeable arms, as well as multiple items to accessorize your Sonic figurines, including a ring, a chaos emerald, and Tails' wrench.
body.description: Bringing the world of Sonic the Hedgehog to life, this set of 4-inch action figures is a must-have for your collection! The set includes classic characters of Sonic the Hedgehog, Tails, Knuckles, Amy Rose, and Shadow. These articulated action figures are great for collecting or playing. The bright colors and intricate detailing on each figure are even more impressive when grouped together – a real eye-catcher that you'll be proud to display in any gamers collection. Each character has their own unique look. Hear Sonic blast speed on his way through this adventure with his signature running stance. Jump around or take flight with two-tailed Tails. Clench hard and punch enemies with Knuckles or make enemies tremble with the menacing Shadow figure. This figurine assortment brings all four characters together from the popular Sonic Franchise allowing you to relive your favorite gaming memories anytime at home! Immerse yourself in classic hedgehog fun with iconic replicas from this exciting game world when you grab one of these sonic figurines today!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The box was damaged underneath. Had no choice but to gift it
reviews.reviewText: The head on this item kept falling off. Designed weird. Head pinches the interchangeable arms and causes the head to fall off easy. More of a display item and not a toy to play with

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good for cake topper
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this to use as a cake topper and it was perfect size. After the birthday my little one start playing with it and he likes that he can change the ring and gem on Sonics hand, based on his imaginary stories...

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My Granddaughter just loved her gift! It is big enough to play with and matched the size of her other toys. This present was a perfect fit!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I like it but be aware
reviews.reviewText: I bought this and it arrived within 2 days. For the most part I'm very happy with it. Before opening the box I noticed Sonics nose already broke off. Not a big deal everything else is perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this gift for my nephew for Christmas and he loved it. He was over joyed because he really likes Sonic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It breaks easily
reviews.reviewText: I just bought this for my three-year old and it breaks easily. First, you must take the head off to change out the arms and after the first night of play the head was no longer stable. It would spinning in circles every time my son held it which was frustrating for him. Then within a few days the nose popped off and even after trying to glue it back on with gorilla glue it still would not go back on. I am now in the market for another Shadow character and it's only been 5 days since I bought this one. I will never buy a character like this again. He has a huge collection of sonic characters from all different companies and this is the worst one .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Grandson had to have more of his Sonic favorites

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This should be advertised as a stationary figure. The arms and head don’t stay on and the hands are too heavy to retain any action poses.

reviews.reviewTitle: Figura bem feita e nostalgia pura
